original_text: Use gold to cover the boards and to make rings for the boards. These rings will hold the bars in place across the boards. Also cover the wooden bars with gold.
korean_text: 그 널판들을 금으로 싸고 그 널판들의 띠를 꿸 금 고리를 만들고 그 띠를 금으로 싸라

sentences.original_text: Use gold to cover the boards
and to make rings for the boards
These rings will hold the bars in place
sentences.korean_translation: 이 고리들은 막대들을 제자리에 고정할 것이다

sentences.original_text: Also cover the wooden bars with gold
